Pelej√§ on humoristisista synkkiin ja genrej√§ on laidasta laitaan.

The Indie Room offers 1-3 hour long indie role playing experiences with a low threshold and without sign-up or preparation. Some of the games don't require a game master, and there can be between approximately 1-6 players (solo games are also available). There are facilitators present to assemble game groups and, if necessary, act as guides and game masters, but the games can also be played among visitors independently. In principle, all games are also suitable for complete beginners. Indie role-playing games are typically non-commercial and experimental, often also minimalistic. Games range from humoristic to dark, and represent a wide range of genres.

Facilitation is available in Finnish, English and Swedish.

description:
This is Spinal Tap! meets Dungeons & Dragons!

[Read as the intro to an over-the-top real crime show]
The village of Urasi used to be an idyllic place, full of life and joy. Until one day, the wyrm Grawyff broke free from her seals in her mountain prison and leveled it to the ground. Nobody survived. Three days before, a party of adventurers was last seen leaving Urasi, in a quest for glory and fame. Were these events connected? Did they do it on purpose? Who were these people? Let us discover it in Behind the Magic.

Behind the Magic is a light-hearted, improvisational free-form role-playing game, where players recreate a mockumentary following a party of inept adventurers on a quest. Players will take turns designing, setting and playing scenes, and letting their characters open up to the camera, er, excuse me, the bard in confessionals.
title: Behind the Magic ‚Äî Who let the wyrm out? 1. Run

description:
The SS are looking for someone in your neighbourhood‚Äôs, maybe you. Will you manage to survive? Will you redeem your sins? At what cost? A larp by Alessandro and Andrea Giovannucci (Chaos League)

You will play blindfolded for an intimate experience, based only on sound, whispers and memories. A co-creative larp dealing with complicity/rebelling against the regime and the struggle for survival. You will play an opponent of the regime, exploring pain and paranoia. You will have a chance to understand how you came to your predicament. Were you part of the problem, as well?

This larp has materials (text and audio) in English, but players can play in Finnish or English, depend how they prefer. Age-restricted larp: you need to bee over 18. This is a serious game about serious topics.

In T.I.M.E Stories you protect the world from paradoxes with your team of time-traveling agents.

The T.I.M.E Agency protects humanity by preventing temporal faults and paradoxes from threatening the fabric of our universe. As temporal agents, you and your team will be sent into the bodies of beings from different worlds or realities to successfully complete the missions given to you. Failure is impossible, as you will be able to go back in time as many times as required.

T.I.M.E Stories is a narrative game, a game of "decksploration". Each player is free to give their character as deep a "role" as they want, in order to live through a story, as much in the game as around the table.

The forces of evil are threatening to overrun Hogwarts castle in Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle, a cooperative deck-building game, and it's up to four students to ensure the safety of the school by defeating villains and consolidating their defenses. In the game, players take on the role of a Hogwarts student: Harry, Ron, Hermione or Neville, each with their own personal deck of cards that's used to acquire resources.

Other cards allow them to regain health or fight against villains, keeping them from gaining power. The villains set back players with their attacks and Dark Arts. description:
Many years ago, Lord Strangford famously ordered a lovely necklace for his lovely wife, Lady Guanita Strangford, made of the biggest emerald ever witnessed in Akoros. He made such a big deal out of it, and insisted so much that she wears it to every event, that the huge gem came to be known as the Lady Guanita Emerald.
Therefore, come the second wife, Lady Marissa Strangford, some years later, a new necklace had to be ordered, and even upped - to two emeralds - as the new wife would not be content with any less. Couple more wives later, the current Lady Wilhelmina Strangford is the proud owner of a necklace of four such gems, the final installment in a series which is now referred to, with a strategic renaming trick, as the Lady Strangford Emeralds.
And then, one day, the young and impetuous Wilhelmina made a huge mistake - secure and haughty in her new position, she publicly mocked the original Lady Strangford. 
Now Guanita is furious, Guanita wants revenge - she wants Wilhelmina ridiculed, humbled - Lord Strangford a laughing stock and angry at his new wife - she wants the very emeralds of the haughty little Wilhelmina Strangford, stripped away from her, together with her stupid little pride. And with her lavish birthday party upcoming, there is sure to be many opportunities towards that.
What does she offer, then? She is not stupid, the original Lady Strangford. Nor poor. She offers more money than you will ever see in a lifetime.
shortDescription: A daring heist for the famous emerald necklace of the Lovely (and Fourth) Lady Strangford
title: The Lady Strangford Emeralds

There are places in the world where the grip of civilization is not as tight. In these places, reality is not as predictable as elsewhere, and they are still home to those creatures and phenomena that once scared our ancestors when they were afraid of the dark around campfires. One of those places is Misty Pines, Washington state. Welcome to visit, you will definitely never want to leave again. In this game, players get to know this peculiar town, its peculiar and even dangerous inhabitants, and the secret at its core. contentWarnings: Violence, Gore, Severe injuries, Body-Horror, Death, Psychological horror, Potential character death, Self-Harm, Claustrophobia, Suffocation, Worms
description:
Nexus Domion, a beautiful old city and the home to the most esteemed University of the Arcane, hides beneath it, dark secrets.

Ancient catacombs sprawl beneath it largely unmapped, unexplored and outside of public knowledge. But what has surfaced, belays signs of a once powerful civilization, that now lies buried. 

You are a student of the arcane whose studies threaten to come to their end, as you cannot find a place for an internship. Others wealthier and better connected than you have theirs already, and you, you are running out of time. 

But an offer is made to you, the same one as to other desperate students in the years before and now again. To join a research party, tasked with retrieving artifacts from the catacombs below. Will you accept? Knowing those who have joined return changed, if at all. 

In this game you explore treacherous catacombs, unraveling their secrets while they attempt to unravel you. The passage of time is twisted beyond recognition. Every step deeper is driving you closer to insanity and ruin, but also closer to success. Will you be the one to make it out alive and unchanged?

Enjoy cursed artifacts, madness effects and some added mechanics to help 5e push you towards despair. But don't worry, there is always hope.


This game contains violence, gore and themes common in psychological and lovecraftian horror.
Recommended for ages 16+ and those with prior D&D 5e experience.

Choose a character from a variety of pre-made characters, or quickly make your own on the spot if you wish.
shortDescription: D&D 5e meets Call of Cthulhu; Sanity, is in short supply.
title: Desperation Arcanum

contentWarnings: Death and violence, PTSD, potentially mental abuse and mass murder
description:
Dear friend,

You are hereby cordially requested for the pleasure of your presence in the Dreistauratio of the undersigned.

I have lot to celebrate this hallowed time, and I wish to celebrate it with a small, but special, group of people, including Yourself. As is proper for the Dreistauratio, I wish to celebrate three milestones: fulfillment of my 27th Standard Year, officially making yours truly the head of the von Alzgau family; my new position as a representative of our liege lord, Duke Germanus von Lyonhons; and finally, my engagement to Calimir af Racchus, another esteemed family who holds allegiance to Duke, and who will pledge themselves in support of the von Alzgau line.

Our celebration will take the form of a journey on the Duke's personal yacht the Renenet, to symbolise our common future together in allegiance to the Imperium, and will last for nine days, as is proper. Exact details will be revealed while onboard, but we will dine, discuss and renew our personal bonds with one another while watching some of the most magnificent vistas in nearby star systems.

Please be at attendance in Kaiserstadthamn Imperial spaceport at the date given, in von Lyonhons lounge in Terminal 3C.

Your servant and friend,

Baronet Elena von Alzgau

--

- Six ready-made characters and background: A demonologist/mage, a conglomerate executive, a priest, a war hero with slight PTSD, a noble, and a refugee who has worked hard to become a successful entrepreneur
- Beginner-friendly rules
- Focus on role-playing, mystery and survival
- Deep world, a result of 30+ years of game development (far deeper than we can hope to get into in the game)

description:
Non-metallic-metal eli NMM on maalaustekniikka, jossa metallipintoja kaikkine heijastuksineen imitoidaan k√§ytt√§m√§tt√§ varsinaisia metallimaaleja.

T√§ss√§ ty√∂pajassa kansainv√§lisesti palkittu figumaalari ja ty√∂kseen opettajana toimiva Erkka 'RaddiCraft' Marttio opastaa osallistujia tekniikan saloihin k√§dest√§ pit√§en.

Mukaan tarvitset ainoastaan oman siveltimen (kokosuositus 000-2). Ty√∂pajasta saat maalattavan figun (Stormcast Eternal), diy-m√§rk√§paletin sek√§ k√§ytett√§v√§t maalit. Omia v√§lineit√§ ja maalausvaloja saa ottaa mukaan.

Tekniikkaa pidet√§√§n usein hieman haasteellisena, joten ty√∂paja soveltuu parhaiten k√§vij√∂ille, joilla figumaalauksen perusteet ovat jo hallussa.

Kysymyksiss√§ ota yhteytt√§ suoraan vet√§j√§√§n s√§hk√∂postitse raddicrafts (√§t) gmail.com tai esim. Instagramissa @raddicraft.

--

Non-metallic metal or NMM is a miniature painting technique, where metallic surfaces are painted by imitating the reflections etc. using paints without actual metallic pigments.

In this workshop award-winning miniature painter & teacher Erkka 'RaddiCraft' Marttio will help you understand the theory and practice behind this technique.

For the workshop you need your own brush (size recommendation 000-2). You'll get the figure (Stormcast Eternal), a diy-wet palette if needed and the paints from the workshop. You're welcome to bring your own equipment and lighting.

As the technique is often considered somewhat advanced, the workshop is best suited for intermediate to advanced miniature painters who already have a grasp of the basics of miniature painting.

If you have any questions feel free to be in touch directly with the teacher through email raddicrafts (at) gmail.com or for example through Instagram @raddicraft.

description:

In this meeting the association elects the new board of members and redistributes the power, all in secret from regular mortals. Do Cryptids and Lizard People find a common ground to work in? Does AI hold too much power already? Whose turn it is to look after Elon Musk and where is the member register?

contentWarnings: The live-action role-playing game is completely non-verbal, partly blind-folded, and played through dancing. The theme of the game is psychological exploration. Thus, the game is physically and psychologically demanding which is acknowledged in the participant description.
description:
In a remote country house, you hesitate. The esoteric new age self-development seminar is about to begin.

Promptly, however, the escalating ceremony leaves your ego behind. The spiritual pilgrims begin to hungrily explore the associative, symbolic, and synesthetic planes of remedy.

Whisper! Mumble! Cry out!

Far in the distance, the Mountain grows and growls. To find its heart, the pilgrims need to traverse surrealist scenes of avant-garde innovation. Gratefully, they are aided. The music of the world is their wind, their bodies are the wings.

Pace! Skip! Swirl!

Yet, the path is uncertain. Will the pilgrims ever find the Blackbird of the Ridge? The infinite emotional expression of self-dissolving unity? The moment that they could call the present?

Superrealism is an experimental live-action role-playing game about looking for and finding that premiered in Stockholm Scenario Festival 2022. 

The non-verbal live action role-playing game is played through movement and embodied expression. The game explores expressing and feeling emotions, and is therefore psychologically demanding. The game is recommended only to those players who wish to explore non-verbal expression of emotions, and for those, previous playthroughs have been inspiring.
otherAccessibilityInformation:
I have run the game four times previously. 

More info and full larp script can be found here: 
https://scenariofestival.se/archive/scenarios-2022/superrealism/

Contact me for more info. I can run the game in either Finnish or English.
title: Superrealism 1. Run

description:
Between Production Lines is a larp about the conflicting nature of placing human beings in rational, mechanised, capitalist systems. Players will be taking on the roles of employees of a children's book factory, assigned with a new project to create. The game will focus on chaotic bureaucracy, making a creative project together, and, most importantly, human nature and emotions. 

The setting is a capitalist utopia of an industrial production line, yet a production line of a very emotional and creative process of creating children‚Äôs books. All characters are somehow involved in the creative process, but are essentially enacting the cogs of the system. The characters are known as serial numbers rather than names, with the social hierarchies of the context being based on things like productivity and cost efficiency. The context has made emotions taboo: it pushes the characters to be as rational and objective as possible, yet human nature emerges to push back with emotions and subjective experiences. Played in three acts, the larp will allow characters to slowly begin discovering and interacting with emotions individually and communally.

Characters will be workshopped together before the game and no props are necessary to take part. All characters will be non-gendered.

Content Warnings: The larp will focus on rediscovering emotions and relationships, with some emotional suppression. Hence strong emotions are likely to be a part of the game. There will also be conflicting and chaotic bureaucracy, which some people may find stressful.  Everything will be workshopped and there will be lots of time for calibration.

Please note that the larp will involve some crafts/art-making. Absolutely no skills are required and you can choose how much you interact with this part of the larp.
title: Between Production Lines

Lately you have been having nightmares. Sometimes you are slowly sinking into a dark pool of quicksand unable to escape. Sometimes there is a hand grabbing your ankle as you're walking in the beach. Sometimes you are in the dark when something approaches and you wake up.

The reason you set out might be to finally check out what the annual Awakening Festival is, or maybe your childhood friend Kienna sent you a strange message inviting you there, or maybe it was an associate inviting you to participate in a business deal there. In any case, something new awaits!

description:
All of you have been comissioned to a secluded area as part of your Kingdom's guard. Your camp of a couple of hundred people sits on top of a hill with a straight view to an isolated village. Moving out of the camp and questioning orders are forbidden, your mission is to stay in camp and observe your surroundings. It has been a few days already and time is passing slowly.. As rebellious whispers are growing louder your group is approached by a frightened looking mage who offers information in return of a favour‚Ä¶ Anything is better than waiting, right?

A dnd 5e homebrew adventure, with a horror twist. Bring your own level 3 character (no UA or homebrew classes, all official sources are ok) It is beneficial to have a short backstory and motivations, motivations can vary within characters as long as we avoid pvp. We will mostly follow official rules, but it is always allowed to suggest and try things!

Might contain: violence, graphic descriptions, scary elements, a possibility of character death
Will not contain: forcing characters, mutilation or permanent changes, sexism, racism, sexual violence, harm to children or animals. Bring up concerns/boundaries before the game or during the game at any time!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

Seurataan p√§√§osin virallisia s√§√§nt√∂j√§, mutta aina saa ehdottaa ja yritt√§√§ asioita!

Spaceship is returning from a long expedition when something goes awry and the warp core overheats. Central computer barely has time to tell the crew to suit up so that when they are blasted into space they survive ‚Äì only to realize that they are on differing trajectories with no chance to affect anything. They remain in radio contact for 18 minutes more. How will they use their time?

In this larp there are no heroes, the cavalry won't be arriving. The metatechniques of the game guide the players through confusion to rage and finally to acceptance.

The game has been designed and tested as a part of the Transformative Game Design curriculum of Uppsala University.

description:

====

The goal in the Speed Painting Contest is to paint a given miniature as well as possible in a given time. The contestants have one hour to paint, and the best painted miniature wins.

Bringing your own miniature into the contest is not needed, as you will be provided one right before the beginning. Naturally, participants can take their contest work with them after the judges have finished the evaluation.

You can participate in the contest either using your own painting supplies (palettes, brushes, paints), or you can take advantage of the selection at Ropecon's Miniature Painting Station.

The main sponsor of this year's contest is The Dragon Trappers Lodge.
title: Pikamaalauskilpailu / Speed Painting Contest 2 (Pe/Fri)

description:
Apocalypse brews under the holy mountain of spirits, littered with ruins and inhabited by the bitter remnants of a fallen kingdom. Adventurers arrive with hopes of treasure and glory, but are they prepared for what lies beneath?

Using epic diorama-style maps of each area, we traverse a fantastical underworld filled with creepy monsters and dusty treasure chests. There is no linear plot or intended path, so anything can happen! We use an easy-to-learn old-school D&D system with emphasis on fast play & immersion. Ready-made characters provided.

Very beginner-friendly. Players must be 18+ years old due to some violence, horror and mature themes, but mostly it doesn¬¥t get very dark. I want to provide an inclusive & safe game for the whole group!

---
When the moon and the stars went dark, only a few worried. When the sun no longer rose and the electrical grid failed, people started to be afraid. When those outside the light maintained by batteries where not seen alive again, the terror started. 

Some unknown terror lurks in the dark. Society has collapsed. Hastily built bunkers are the last havens of light in the world. You are a part of the last rescue party sent to nearby towns to search for survivors in the few places that still have light. Will you survive and return to the light, or will you fall in the dark?

The game is a horror game but will be played with a light-ish touch. Safe gaming mechanics will be used in the game. Instead of dice, the game uses a jenga-tower.

Minuutteja pimennyksen alkamisesta kommunikaatioyhteys Maahan katkesi t√§ysin. T√§hdet katosivat. Aurinko ei palannut. Viisi p√§iv√§√§ my√∂hemmin Kansainv√§liselt√§ Avaruusasemalta saapui yksi, kohiseva h√§t√§viesti: "Ne ovat t√§√§ll√§".

Kasvava m√§√§r√§ aseman sektoreita on jo ilman virtaa, el√§m√§√§ yll√§pit√§v√§t j√§rjestelm√§t vet√§v√§t viimeisi√§√§n ja aseman hiipuva teko√§ly ilmoittaa kiihtyv√§ll√§ tahdilla henkil√∂st√∂n j√§seni√§ kadonneiksi. "Umbra" on traagiseen kauhuun nojaava, intensiivinen kollaboratiivisen tarinankerronnan peli, jossa kuolema on alati l√§sn√§. Mik√§li toivon, ep√§toivon ja v√§√§j√§√§m√§tt√∂m√§n tappion teemat ja niist√§ kriisiytyv√§t hahmot ovat sinua varten, tervetuloa.

description:
Ensin tuli pimeys, se alkoi sumuna, joka muuttui h√§m√§ryydeksi, josta tuli pimeys. Pimeys joka tukahdutti valon, ajoi ihmiset piiloon. Sitten nousi vesi, ja ajoi ihmiset yh√§ korkeammalle, ja korkeammalle kunnes tilaa ei ollut. 
Eik√§ mennyt kauaa kun NE tulivat.
Korkean tornin huipulle ker√§√§ntynyt pieni joukko kyyh√∂tt√§√§ kuolevan valon loisteessa, mutta pian sekin valo sammuu ja on jatkettava matkaa.

10 candles on pelisysteemi, joka pohjaa vahvasti yhteiseen tarinankerrontaan, ja jota aikatauluttaa kynttil√§t joiden sammuminen vie peli√§ eteenp√§in. T√§m√§ on peli, jota ei voi voittaa, jossa kaikki hahmot joutuvat alistumaan pimeydelle. Tavoitteena peliss√§ on kuitenkin pit√§√§ kiinni toivosta, joka hahmoilla on, niin pitk√§√§n kuin mahdollista ja siten kertoa yhdess√§ merkityksellinen tarina.

Systeemi√§ ei tarvitse osata, eik√§ mukaan tarvitse muuta kuin avoimen mielen ja halun kertoa yhdess√§ t√§m√§ tarina. 



First the darkness came. It started as a fog, which turned to dimness and that became darkness. Darkness that suffocated all light, drove people into hiding. Then the water rose, and made people go higher and higher until there was no place to go to.
It did not take long for THEM to arrive.
A group gathered on top of the very high tower is illuminated by a dying light, but soon it will go out and it will be time to move.

10 candles is a system which is strongly based on shared storytelling and which is scheduled by the candles whose extinguishing advances the game. This is an unwinnable game where all characters are forced to succumb to the darkness. However, the goal in the game is to hold on to the hope that the characters have for as long as possible and thus tell a meaningful story together.

You don't need to know the system, and all you need is an open mind and a desire to tell this story together.

description:
Lost for Wine (D&D 5e, level 5)
The small town of Gartenfraud is a simple town with simple traditions. Most of the common folks that live there all work at the vineyard providing some of the most delicious components for the best wines out there. But the town has been lately experiencing an unusual disappearance of people. Some never get to work, others just gone missing with no trace.

  Recently, the residents of Gartenfraud have begun noticing dark things in the streets at night and quiet whispers and moans echoing from the abandoned mansion of Gartencas, the previous mayor‚Äôs house. With alarm sweeping through the town, the council has sent out a cry for adventurers brave enough to investigate these happenings and resolve them.

The party's goal:
Investigate the manor and find out what's causing the noise and the disappearance of people.


Session's length: ~4-5 hours (2-3x breaks incl.)
Level: 5
Characters: pre-made sheets will be provided.
Character creation: If you create your character by yourself, use Standard Array or Point Buy. (Optional)
otherAccessibilityInformation: The game is ran in English, although the DM speaks finnish fluently.
title: Lost for Wine

description:
Are you starting a new game and want to draw your character? Are you an eager Game Master who likes to draw NPC and other assets? Whether you have never dared to even try, have never take the time, or are just looking for like-minded people, come to join and get motivated to draw!

I'm Liv, working in the animation film industry and a TTRPG nerd. I love to draw my game characters whether it's a portrait or in-game action! I want to help you draw your character, by discussing about their personality, powers, and how to show that in one drawing. It could be the start of a bigger illustration, brainstorming ideas for you to explore later etc. We will use paper and pencils for this but feel free to bring any material.

This is a LGBTQI+ friendly workshop, come with your ideas of all genders and shapes. If you want to draw for a game session you have later in Ropecon, that is also a possibility :)

Signup through Konsti, starting at 18.00 on Friday July 28th.
title: Draw Your Character!

description:
Pikamaalauskisassa tavoitteena on maalata annettu miniatyyri mahdollisimman hyvin annetussa ajassa. Aikaa maalaamiseen on varattu yksi tunti, ja parhaiten maalattu figu voittaa.

Et tarvitse kisaan omaa figua, vaan saat sen toivomallasi pohjamaalilla juuri ennen suorituksen alkua. Luonnollisesti kisaty√∂n saa ottaa mukaansa tuomaroinnin j√§lkeen.

Kisan p√§√§sponsorina toimii t√§n√§ vuonna The Dragon Trappers Lodge.

====

The goal in the Speed Painting Contest is to paint a given miniature as well as possible in a given time. The contestants have one hour to paint, and the best painted miniature wins.

Bringing your own miniature into the contest is not needed, as you will be provided one right before the beginning. Naturally, participants can take their contest work with them after the judges have finished the evaluation.

You can participate in the contest either using your own painting supplies (palettes, brushes, paints), or you can take advantage of the selection at Ropecon's Miniature Painting Station.

The main sponsor of this year's contest is The Dragon Trappers Lodge.
title: Pikamaalauskilpailu / Speed Painting Contest 3 (La/Sat)

For English speakers: Short presentation in Finnish. Personal guidance in both Finnish and English


ENGLANNIKSI

Miniature model terrain workshop

An ancient ruined city or a space station? A secret fey home under the ferns or a steely smelling battlefield of the future? What kind of terrain stirs the imagination and works best for gaming purposes? Design and make your own minature adventure locations!

In the presentation, we go through various easy methods and everyday materials, from which you can creatively make small-scale terrains yourself for role-playing games, miniature games and dioramas. In the work section, we plan and start building our own terrain.

The workshop is suitable for beginners and those who have been building for a long time.

description:
Tervetuloa keskiaikaisen Suomen ikimetsiin, miss√§ suomalainen mytologia ja perim√§tieto her√§√§v√§t eloon Souls-pelisarjasta tuttujen kauhuteemojen kera. Pimeys vallitsee sumujen peitt√§mien metsien syd√§mess√§, vaarat vaanivat joka kulman takana ja Kalevalasta tutut hahmot kuten V√§in√§m√∂inen ja Louhi ovat palanneet kamppailemaan maan hallinnasta. Pelaajat astuvat ep√§kuolleiden mets√§suomalaisten saappaisiin kohtaamaan myyttisi√§ olentoja, ratkomaan mysteereit√§ ja kenties l√∂yt√§m√§√§n v√§kevi√§ taikaesineit√§ ja muita legendaarisia aarteita.

J√§rjest√§n Ropeconissa kaksi peli√§, joissa on sama teema mutta eri sis√§lt√∂.

Shadowdark RPG on D&D-pohjainen, alkuvuodesta '23 julkaistu helppo, nopea ja virtaviivainen j√§rjestelm√§. Osallistuminen ei vaadi aiempaa kokemusta roolipelaamisesta, kokeneemmille monet mekaniikat ovat varmasti ennest√§√§n tuttuja. Tarjolla on mahdollisuus luoda oma hahmo, tai pelata valmiilla hahmolla.

--

Welcome to the ancient forests of medieval Finland, where Finnish mythology and folklore come to life alongside horror themes familiar from the Souls video game series. Darkness reigns within the mist-shrouded forests, with dangers lurking around every corner, and beloved characters from the Kalevala, such as V√§in√§m√∂inen and Louhi, have returned to vie for control of the land. Players step into the shoes of undead forest Finns to confront mythical creatures, solve mysteries, and perhaps discover powerful magical artifacts and other legendary treasures.

I will run two games in Ropecon, with the same theme but different content.

Shadowdark RPG is a D&D-based, easy, fast, and streamlined tabletop role-playing system, released in early '23. Participation does not require prior experience in role-playing games, although more experienced players will likely find many mechanics familiar. You have the option to create your own character or play with pre-generated characters.
otherAccessibilityInformation: Programme relies on verbal communication. Please reach out in advance if concerned about themes and we can check if the game is suitable for you.
shortDescription: Finnish mythology with a soulslike twist
title: Ikimetsien varjot 1

Erilaisia PbtA-pelej√§ on viime vuosina julkaistu lukemattomilla erilaisilla teemoilla. description:
All that is between you and the content of the treasure chest is a padlock.

Lock-picking is the practice of unlocking a lock by manipulating the components of the lock device without the original key.
The workshop will teach the basic methods of lock-picking and lock bypassing. The arranger will provide practice pin tumbler locks and borrow lock picks for all workshop participants. The workshop will include history and a brief introduction to different lock types and pick methods. Most of the workshop time will be spent practicing lock-picking together with the instructor. Lock-picking requires fine motor skills and use of both hands.

The workshop is the same as last year, however hopefully the presentation have slightly improved. 

Note: Although lock-picking can be associated with criminal intent, it is an essential skill for the legitimate profession of locksmithing, and is also pursued by law-abiding citizens as a useful skill to learn, or simply as a hobby (locksport).

Signup through the Konsti system starting at 18.00 on Friday July 28th.
title: Lockpicking Workshop for Beginners

description:
Mythic Game Master Emulator released its 2nd version at the beginning of 2023.

With Mythic you can play solo or without a GM any RPG. Let's have an improvised game where Mythic will guide us through it. There is no traditional GM in this game. This session is a great way to get to know the Mythic system if you are interested in solo playing.

The characters are built with QuestWorlds' as-you-go method so it is easy to get going without too much pre-work.

The genre and setting are decided at the beginning of the session.

The game will be held in English but if all the players speak Finnish it can be held in Finnish, too.

description:

A cozy slice-of-life adventure at a fantasy cafe. Little or no combat. Make your own D&D character of any level up to 5 using any officially published sources.

(Content notes: family problems, customer service)

description:
Every year, the Pathfinder Society inducts new classes of recruits into their ranks. The three deans of the Society's schools, the Spells, Scrolls, and Swords, are responsible for ensuring that the new recruits have the basic skills and experience necessary to thrive in the field. PCs participating in this adventure will get to meet all three of the Society's deans and undergo their unique challenges, proving their worth and fitness to join the Pathfinder Society!

Written by Sean McGowan

This adventure is for level 1 characters - bring your own Pathfinder Society character or use a pre-made character to jump straight into the action!
title: Pathfinder Society #2-11 The Pathfinder Trials

description:

Good Society is a collaborative regency rpg that seeks to capture the heart, and the countenance, of Jane Austen‚Äôs work.
It is a game of balls, estates, sly glances, and turns about the garden. At least on the surface. Underneath this, just as in Austen‚Äôs own novels, it is a game of social ambition, family obligation and breathtaking, heart-stopping longing.

The system uses no dice and is highly reliant on players own active participation on the role playing action. Come write your own book about the lives of the "better folk" of the regency period.

description:
Indiehuone tarjoaa 1-3 tunnin mittaisia indieroolipelikokemuksia matalalla kynnyksell√§ ja ilman ennakkoilmoittaumista tai ennakkovalmistautumista. Pelej√§ on humoristisista synkkiin ja genrej√§ on laidasta laitaan.

The Indie Room offers 1-3 hour long indie role playing experiences with a low threshold and without sign-up or preparation. Some of the games don't require a game master, and there can be between approximately 1-6 players (solo games are also available). There are facilitators present to assemble game groups and, if necessary, act as guides and game masters, but the games can also be played among visitors independently. In principle, all games are also suitable for complete beginners. Indie role-playing games are typically non-commercial and experimental, often also minimalistic. Games range from humoristic to dark, and represent a wide range of genres.

Facilitation is available in Finnish, English and Swedish.

description:
So the great Goblin Chieftain wants to impress the grandest of the wizards who is celebrating its 500th birthday. Problem is that goblins seldomly live long enough to know what this "birthday" is. But what the Chieftain does know is that you need Cake. So he has seen it wise to send you and your spawn mates to acquire (steal) this Cake from the humans.

Fortunately for your bunch, the nearby human town is celebrating what they call a "royal wedding" and it seems to involve Cake. Now all you need is to pull off your first ever heist. It can't be that hard, can it?

This game will be run using Goblin Quest (by Grant Howitt) and is very light-hearted. At the start of the game each player creates their own clutch of five goblins. Each player playing one of their goblins at a time, will fumble through their possibly epic quest and lose goblins to dangers along the way (such as human guards, deep moats, hot fires, lute music, eating too much). The game can be easily left early if necessary. Suitable for younger players, but does involve (mostly accidental and very slapstick) violence towards the goblins. 

Note: the game does not include real-life cake.
otherAccessibilityInformation: A small part of the character creation is to draw silly faces for your goblins. The inability to do simple drawings might hinder the enjoyment of the game, but does not prevent taking part.
shortDescription: Goblins on a light-hearted quest to steal cake
title: Goblins Need Cake

description:
Undermountain, the infamous megadungeon. Many an adventurer has faced death and destruction in its halls and many have dragged riches beyond their dreams from its depths.
Once again call comes for brave or just foolhardy adventurers to brave the depths of the abode of Halaster Blackcloak and maybe, if Lady Luck wishes, emerge with a fortune.

Undermountain is too big to be played in one session of any con, however, the idea is to see how long will the characters get. And at some point they will decide that caution is indeed a better part of valor. Where-ever they decide to leave it, next Ropecon, their successors will continue based on the maps the previous group drew!

Game can be played in finnish or english.
title: Expedition to Undermountain

description:
Three visitors of utmost importance are rumored to be on the guest list for this year's harvest festival, each of them searching for new prospective chefs. In order to impress such experienced palates, you and your fellow adventurers must search for ingredients, come up with a menu and prepare the dishes in a grand cook-off. Watch out though - your competitors may have some nasty surprises in store for your team...

This is a comedic, character-driven game of DnD (5th edition rules) for level 3 characters, hosted in english. Previous experience with the game system not mandatory. You may apply for the game with your own character, or choose your character from several pre-made options. 

The game includes exploration and combat, and thus a little bit of violence and danger can be expected. Most of the action involves monsters, humanoid creatures and possibly animals (if the players choose a non-vegetarian menu). No "R-rated" content though e.g. no detailed gore

Bon appetit! May the best chefs win.

Wanderhome - Crossroads of the Past and the Future

You are at a crossroads. Your past life is ending and an unknown path lies ahead. Come discover what your past life was like, why it was precious, and why it‚Äôs now time to move on. The crossroads lies ahead. Will you choose the path to the future or go back to the past.

description:
In the aftermath of the Data Scourge, the Starfinder Society fractures along faction lines! Faced with the past mistakes of the Society, the betrayal and heinous crimes of former Starfinders (including the now notorious Historia-Prime), the grievances of active agents, and the weakening of external alliances, First Seeker Ehu Hadif embarks on a year of change, opening the floor to all agents, and giving them a platform through which to voice concerns, plans, ambitions, and lobby for change. Amid this turmoil, Ehu Hadif tasks a team of Starfinders with assisting three minor factions he believes are integral to the future of the Starfinder Society: the longstanding Manifold Host and the newly formed Advocates and Cognates factions, led by well-respected Starfinders Zigvigix and Royo. Take the first steps toward a brighter future in the Year of Redemption's Rise!

Bring your own Starfinder Society character between levels 1 and 4, or use a pre-made character to jump right into the action!
title: Starfinder Society #5-01: Year of Redemption's Rise

---

The legend tells that in the Year of the Fox for one day the Castle Blackmore becomes accessible. That day has arrived and the rainbow bridge that connects to the Castle shines bright. Adventurers heed the call to uncover the secrets of the Blackmore Castle and discover the fate of the missing bard. The history of heavy music and roleplaying intertwined and both took and shared inspirations from one another. This adventure is celebrating the first three classic albums of the band Rainbow and also includes a flavorful take on the bands history. (This adventure can also be played in english if agreed by all parties. Tolerance for butchered english pronunciation required though)

description:
Studying his grandfather's map, Bilbo Baggins has made a remarkable discovery: the location of a renowned artefact from the Shire's history. He is now gathering an expedition of friends and cousins to retrieve the treasure from the North Moors. ENGLANNIKSI

Miniature model terrain workshop

An ancient ruined city or a space station? A secret fey home under the ferns or a steely smelling battlefield of the future? What kind of terrain stirs the imagination and works best for gaming purposes? Design and make your own minature adventure locations!

====

The goal in the Speed Painting Contest is to paint a given miniature as well as possible in a given time. The contestants have one hour to paint, and the best painted miniature wins.

Bringing your own miniature into the contest is not needed, as you will be provided one right before the beginning. Naturally, participants can take their contest work with them after the judges have finished the evaluation.

You can participate in the contest either using your own painting supplies (palettes, brushes, paints), or you can take advantage of the selection at Ropecon's Miniature Painting Station.

The main sponsor of this year's contest is The Dragon Trappers Lodge.

The forces of evil are threatening to overrun Hogwarts castle in Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle, a cooperative deck-building game, and it's up to four students to ensure the safety of the school by defeating villains and consolidating their defenses. In the game, players take on the role of a Hogwarts student: Harry, Ron, Hermione or Neville, each with their own personal deck of cards that's used to acquire resources.
By gaining influence, players add more cards to their deck in the form of iconic characters, spells, and magical items. Other cards allow them to regain health or fight against villains, keeping them from gaining power. The villains set back players with their attacks and Dark Arts. Only by working together will players be able to defeat all of the villains, securing the castle from the forces of evil.
-julkaisijan kuvaus pelist√§

description:
Shuriken refers to a blade hidden in the hand, but it is usually used to mean a japanese thrown weapon. We will be using real b≈ç shuriken (Ê£íÊâãË£èÂâ£) i.e. needle-like blades designed to be thrown at targets in the workshop. 

Japanese b≈ç shuriken are thrown so that there is as little rotation as possible so that the blade points at the target as much as possible during its flight towards the opponent. Two main methods of throwing exist: jiki da-ho in which the blade does not revolve; and han-ten da-ho in which the blade spins like in traditional western knife throwing. Throwing techniques are challenging and require plenty of practice. Bujinkan practitioners are given instruction in shuriken throwing from various positions and distances. Shuriken are also used as makeshift m√™l√©e weapons in close combat. Many traditional samurai styles include the shuriken, and were therefore not an exclusive ninja weapon. In all probability, shuriken jutsu developed from throwing stones and sharpened coins.

The teacher is Erick Ellison 15 dan. More information: Bujin.fi

Signup through Konsti starting Friday at 18.00.
title: How to Use Bo-Shuriken

description:
This is Spinal Tap! meets Dungeons & Dragons!

[Read as the intro to an over-the-top real crime show]
The village of Urasi used to be an idyllic place, full of life and joy. Until one day, the wyrm Grawyff broke free from her seals in her mountain prison and leveled it to the ground. Nobody survived. Three days before, a party of adventurers was last seen leaving Urasi, in a quest for glory and fame. Were these events connected? Did they do it on purpose? Who were these people? Let us discover it in Behind the Magic.

Behind the Magic is a light-hearted, improvisational free-form role-playing game, where players recreate a mockumentary following a party of inept adventurers on a quest. Players will take turns designing, setting and playing scenes, and letting their characters open up to the camera, er, excuse me, the bard in confessionals.
title: Behind the Magic ‚Äî Who let the wyrm out? 2. Run

description:
The SS are looking for someone in your neighbourhood‚Äôs, maybe you. Will you manage to survive? Will you redeem your sins? At what cost? A larp by Alessandro and Andrea Giovannucci (Chaos League)

You will play blindfolded for an intimate experience, based only on sound, whispers and memories. A co-creative larp dealing with complicity/rebelling against the regime and the struggle for survival. You will play an opponent of the regime, exploring pain and paranoia. You will have a chance to understand how you came to your predicament. Were you part of the problem, as well?

This larp has materials (text and audio) in English, but players can play in Finnish or English, depend how they prefer. Age-restricted larp: you need to bee over 18. This is a serious game about serious topics.

description:
Taking a much-needed relaxing break in between escapades, four gun-toting adventurers post up in a dingy bar in one of Alkenstar's entertainment districts. Right across the street at a theater, people flood inside to catch the premiere of a highly-advertised play, but what comes out of the theater is far more dangerous. As people scatter to safety in the dusty streets, its up to the group of gunslingers in the bar to set things right.

This short Pathfinder 2nd edition adventure written by Michael Sayre is intended to be completed in a single session and includes four 3rd-level pregenerated gunslinger characters, who make use of the exciting new equpment and rules found in Pathfinder Guns & Gears, whose backstories and motivations tie closely to one another.
title: Pathfinder One-Shot #3: Headshot the Rot

Pelikielen√§ suomi tai tarvittaessa englanti. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A sprawling cavern system was discovered underneath the forests of Nilsi√§ in the summer of 2012. As you entered to discover the ancient relics from centuries past, the roof of the caverns collapsed, trapping you inside. The only remaining shreds of hope lie deeper within the tunnels.

Ten candles is a rules-light tabletop rpg, that relies on shared storytelling between participants. The game is played in the dark with only candles lighting the table. The game will involve themes related to the horror genre such as death, blood, violence and darkness.

If needed the game can be played in English.

description:
Maailmassa on paikkoja, joissa sivilisaation ote ei ole yht√§ tiukka. N√§iss√§ paikoissa todellisuus ei ole yht√§ ennustettavissa kun muualla, ja niiss√§ asuu viel√§ niit√§ olentoja ja ilmi√∂it√§, jotka joskus pelottivat esi-isi√§mme kun he pelk√§siv√§t pimeytt√§ leirinuotioiden ymp√§rill√§. Yksi n√§ist√§ paikoista on Misty Pines, Washingtonin osavaltiossa. Tervetuloa vierailulle, et varmasti halua l√§hte√§ en√§√§ koskaan. T√§ss√§ peliss√§ pelaajat p√§√§sev√§t tutustumaan t√§h√§n omalaatuiseen paikkakuntaan, sen omalaatuisiin ja vaarallisiinkin asukkaisiin, sek√§ salaisuuteen sen ytimess√§. Ja ehk√§ pelaajien omilla hahmoillakaan ei ole kaikki aivan normaalia.

---

There are places in the world where the grip of civilization is not as tight. In these places, reality is not as predictable as elsewhere, and they are still home to those creatures and phenomena that once scared our ancestors when they were afraid of the dark around campfires. One of those places is Misty Pines, Washington state. Welcome to visit, you will definitely never want to leave again. In this game, players get to know this peculiar town, its peculiar and even dangerous inhabitants, and the secret at its core. And maybe not everything is quite normal with the players' own characters either.

description:
Dear friend,

You are hereby cordially requested for the pleasure of your presence in the Dreistauratio of the undersigned.

I have lot to celebrate this hallowed time, and I wish to celebrate it with a small, but special, group of people, including Yourself. As is proper for the Dreistauratio, I wish to celebrate three milestones: fulfillment of my 27th Standard Year, officially making yours truly the head of the von Alzgau family; my new position as a representative of our liege lord, Duke Germanus von Lyonhons; and finally, my engagement to Calimir af Racchus, another esteemed family who holds allegiance to Duke, and who will pledge themselves in support of the von Alzgau line.

Our celebration will take the form of a journey on the Duke's personal yacht the Renenet, to symbolise our common future together in allegiance to the Imperium, and will last for nine days, as is proper. Exact details will be revealed while onboard, but we will dine, discuss and renew our personal bonds with one another while watching some of the most magnificent vistas in nearby star systems.

Please be at attendance in Kaiserstadthamn Imperial spaceport at the date given, in von Lyonhons lounge in Terminal 3C.

Your servant and friend,

Baronet Elena von Alzgau

--

- Six ready-made characters and background: A demonologist/mage, a conglomerate executive, a priest, a war hero with slight PTSD, a noble, and a refugee who has worked hard to become a successful entrepreneur
- Beginner-friendly rules
- Focus on role-playing, mystery and survival
- Deep world, a result of 30+ years of game development (far deeper than we can hope to get into in the game)

----

June 15th, 1815. Napoleon has declared himself emperor again and is marching his army into the Netherlands. The French Marshal Ney is tasked with taking the strategically important crossroads of Quatre Bras from the Anglo-Allied commander, the Duke of Wellington.

Come command tens of thousands of troops in this (relatively) simple war strategy game. Will you let the cannons roar or order your cavalry to charge? The keys to victory are in your hand!

description:
It looks a drab brownish red, spinning in the vast void, orbiting a glaring sun: DS 11, Gloria, Mesa, Legionrest, Ol' Dusty, That Miserable Excuse for a Planet, a world of many names. It is a bleak and war-torn planet of barely recovered ecosystems and rugged frontierspeople. Nestled in the contested colonial reaches beyond the blink gate network, it lies far enough away from the Core worlds that the hegemon Union is but hearsay. Instead of the bounty and freedoms guaranteed by the Utopian Pillars of universal human rights, it has the harsh rule and scant justice of severe foreign conquerors and grasping captains of industry.

And here you've come for that one last job before you retire. To one last time don your hardsuit, strap into your mech and ride into fire, armed with laser and kinetic and your burning will. Here awaits that one last sweet score that will yield you all the Manna you could spend in the days you have left, maybe even enough to drown your regrets and quieten the ghosts of your past. For what this place lacks in utopian abundance, it makes up for in opportunity and grit, old sins and new promises, and the heady stuff of not-yet-formed legend! It is a place for mechs and their pilots, for people like you: crooks and heroes, idealists and traitors. It is a place for Lancers.

Koloniaplaneetat, kaukana t√§htienv√§lisen Unionin utopia-aatteesta, kutsuvat idealisteja, h√§ik√§ilem√§tt√∂mi√§ ja kunnianhimoisia. P√∂lyinen ja sodan runtelema Gloria valloittajineen, uudisraivaajineen ja vaivoin toipunein luontoineen on koloniaksikin rajamaa, t√§ynn√§ sisua, mahdollisuutta, vanhoja syntej√§ ja uusia lupauksia. 

Ja sinne sin√§ olet tullut, saadaksesi sen mik√§ sinulta on ev√§tty. Siell√§ sinua odottaa yksi viimeinen keikka, sellainen josta sataa Mannaa loppuel√§m√§ksesi, ehk√§ jopa tarpeeksi hautaakseen menneisyytesi haamut. Sill√§ kun mechisi ohjaimissa astut tuleen, laserit ja kineettiset toimintavalmiudessa, palava tahtosi leiskuen, ei kukaan voi sinua vastustaa! Legendasi kutsuu, Lansieeri.

Spaceship is returning from a long expedition when something goes awry and the warp core overheats. Central computer barely has time to tell the crew to suit up so that when they are blasted into space they survive ‚Äì only to realize that they are on differing trajectories with no chance to affect anything. They remain in radio contact for 18 minutes more. How will they use their time?

In this larp there are no heroes, the cavalry won't be arriving. The metatechniques of the game guide the players through confusion to rage and finally to acceptance.

The game has been designed and tested as a part of the Transformative Game Design curriculum of Uppsala University.

description:
T√§n√§√§n Bingossa luvassa j√§ttipotti, 50 000 dollaria! Jotkut pelaavat mahdollisuudesta muuttaa el√§m√§ns√§ parempaan ja toiset vain etsiv√§t hauskaa iltaa yst√§vien kanssa.

Miksi t√§m√§ voitto on t√§rke√§ sinulle, vai onko? Oletko valmis tekem√§√§n diilin p√∂yt√§seurueesi kanssa ja ja pid√§tk√∂ kiinni sopimuksesta? Oletko todellakin niin varakas tai k√∂yh√§ milt√§ n√§yt√§t? Kadehditko noita rikkaita jotka ovat t√§√§ll√§ vain huvin vuoksi? Ansaitsevatko he voittaa?

Bingo! sijoittuu Lexingtonin kaupunkiin Kentuckyn osavaltiossa. Hahmot ovat tulleet paikalliseen Bingo-saliin toivoen voittavansa el√§m√§√§ muuttavan 50 000 dollarin j√§ttipotin. Jotkut hahmot tulevat bingoon puhtaasti pelin j√§nnityksen vuoksi, nauttien j√§nnityksest√§ ja energiasta v√§litt√§m√§tt√§ rahasta. Toiset ovat kuitenkin ep√§toivoisia ja toivovat, ett√§ voitto muuttaa heid√§n el√§m√§ns√§ parempaan suuntaan.

Peli kest√§√§ 45-60 minuuttia. Peli tapahtuu pieniss√§ ryhmiss√§ oman p√∂yd√§n ymp√§rill√§, yhdess√§ p√∂yd√§ss√§ on 3-5 hahmoa. Hahmot ovat jaettu p√∂yt√§√§n sen mukaan kuinka varakkailta he n√§ytt√§v√§t. Pelaajat saavat valita varakkaalta n√§ytt√§v√§t ja v√§hemm√§n varakkaan hahmon v√§lilt√§. Ei tarvetta propeille, hienompi p√∂yt√§ kertoo muille pelaajille kuinka varakkaalta hahmosi n√§ytt√§√§.

Hahmokuvaukset ovat lyhyit√§ kuvauksia hahmon taloudellisesta tilanteesta ja taustasta. T√§m√§n lis√§ksi hahmoille arvotaan, onko hahmo valmis tekem√§√§n diilin voitosta. Pelaaja p√§√§tt√§√§ itse hahmon tarkemmat tiedot, esimerkiksi nimen, i√§n ja mahdolliset perhesuhteet. P√∂yt√§seurue kontaktoituu yhdess√§ ennen pelin aloitusta ja sopivat keskin√§iset suhteet.

Peli pelataan yht√§aikaisesti suomeksi ja englanniksi. P√∂yt√§seurue voi valita k√§ytt√§v√§ns√§ my√∂s muuta kielt√§, mutta pelimateriaalit on suomeksi ja englanniksi.

--

Today there is a jackbot in Bingo! Some are playing for the chance to change their life for the better and others are simply looking for a fun night out with friends. 

Why this win is important for you, or is it? Are you ready to make a deal with your table about the winning? Will you keep the deal? Are you really that rich or poor than you look? Do you envy those rich people who are here just for fun? Do they deserve to win?

Bingo! takes place in the city of Lexington, Kentucky. Characters have come to the local Bingo hall in hopes of winning the life-changing jackpot of $50,000. Some characters come to Bingo! purely for the thrill of the game, enjoying the excitement and energy of the atmosphere without really caring about the money. Others, however, are desperate for the jackpot, hoping that a win will change their lives for the better.

Game lasts about 45-60 minutes. Game happens in small groups around their own tables, one table has 3-5 characters. Characters are divided to the tables based on how wealthy they look. Players may choose between wealthy looking and not so wealthy looking characters. No props required, fancier table shows how wealthy your character looks like!

Character descriptions are short descriptions of characters financial situation and background. In addition, lottery will decide if the character is ready to make a deal with others are they going to keep the deal. Player will invent details of the character, for example name, age and possible family relations. Gametable creates relations together before the game begins. 

The game is run simultaneously in Finnish and English. Gametable may choose to use other language also, but the game material is in Finnish and English.
title: BINGO! 1. Pelautus / 1. Run

Central computer barely has time to tell the crew to suit up so that when they are blasted into space they survive ‚Äì only to realize that they are on differing trajectories with no chance to affect anything. They remain in radio contact for 18 minutes more. How will they use their time?

In this larp there are no heroes, the cavalry won't be arriving. The metatechniques of the game guide the players through confusion to rage and finally to acceptance.

The game has been designed and tested as a part of the Transformative Game Design curriculum of Uppsala University.

contentWarnings: The live-action role-playing game is completely non-verbal, partly blind-folded, and played through dancing. The theme of the game is psychological exploration. Thus, the game is physically and psychologically demanding which is acknowledged in the participant description.
description:
In a remote country house, you hesitate. The esoteric new age self-development seminar is about to begin.

Promptly, however, the escalating ceremony leaves your ego behind. The spiritual pilgrims begin to hungrily explore the associative, symbolic, and synesthetic planes of remedy.

Whisper! Mumble! Cry out!

Far in the distance, the Mountain grows and growls. To find its heart, the pilgrims need to traverse surrealist scenes of avant-garde innovation. Gratefully, they are aided. The music of the world is their wind, their bodies are the wings.

Pace! Skip! Swirl!

Yet, the path is uncertain. Will the pilgrims ever find the Blackbird of the Ridge? The infinite emotional expression of self-dissolving unity? The moment that they could call the present?

Superrealism is an experimental live-action role-playing game about looking for and finding that premiered in Stockholm Scenario Festival 2022. 

The game is non-verbal and played through movement and embodied expression. The game explores expressing and feeling emotions, and is therefore psychologically demanding. The game is recommended only to those players who wish to explore non-verbal expression of emotions, and for those, previous playthroughs have been inspiring.
otherAccessibilityInformation:
I have run the game four times previously. 

More info and full larp script can be found here: 
https://scenariofestival.se/archive/scenarios-2022/superrealism/

Contact me for more info. I can run the game in either Finnish or English.
title: Superrealism 2. Run

contentWarnings: Violence, Gore, Severe injuries, Body Horror, Death, Psychological horror, Potential character death, Self-Harm, Claustrophobia, Suffocation, Worms
description:
Nexus Domion, a beautiful old city and the home to the most esteemed University of the Arcane, hides beneath it, dark secrets.

Ancient catacombs sprawl beneath it largely unmapped, unexplored and outside of public knowledge. But what has surfaced, belays signs of a once powerful civilization, that now lies buried. 

You are a student of the arcane whose studies threaten to come to their end, as you cannot find a place for an internship. Others wealthier and better connected than you have theirs already, and you, you are running out of time. 

But an offer is made to you, the same one as to other desperate students in the years before and now again. To join a research party, tasked with retrieving artifacts from the catacombs below. Will you accept? Knowing those who have joined return changed, if at all. 

In this game you explore treacherous catacombs, unraveling their secrets while they attempt to unravel you. The passage of time is twisted beyond recognition. Every step deeper is driving you closer to insanity and ruin, but also closer to success. Will you be the one to make it out alive and unchanged?

Enjoy cursed artifacts, madness effects and some added mechanics to help 5e push you towards despair. But don't worry, there is always hope.


This game contains violence, gore and themes common in psychological and lovecraftian horror.
Recommended for ages 16+ and those with prior D&D 5e experience.

Choose a character from a variety of pre-made characters, or quickly make your own on the spot if you wish.
shortDescription: D&D 5e meets Call of Cthulhu; Sanity, is in short supply.
title: Desperation Arcanum

--

Today there is a jackbot in Bingo! Some are playing for the chance to change their life for the better and others are simply looking for a fun night out with friends. 

Why this win is important for you, or is it? Are you ready to make a deal with your table about the winning? Will you keep the deal? Are you really that rich or poor than you look? Do you envy those rich people who are here just for fun? Do they deserve to win?

Bingo! takes place in the city of Lexington, Kentucky. Characters have come to the local Bingo hall in hopes of winning the life-changing jackpot of $50,000. Some characters come to Bingo! purely for the thrill of the game, enjoying the excitement and energy of the atmosphere without really caring about the money. Others, however, are desperate for the jackpot, hoping that a win will change their lives for the better.

Game lasts about 45-60 minutes. Game happens in small groups around their own tables, one table has 3-5 characters. Characters are divided to the tables based on how wealthy they look. Players may choose between wealthy looking and not so wealthy looking characters. No props required, fancier table shows how wealthy your character looks like!

Character descriptions are short descriptions of characters financial situation and background. In addition, lottery will decide if the character is ready to make a deal with others are they going to keep the deal. Player will invent details of the character, for example name, age and possible family relations. Gametable creates relations together before the game begins. 

The game is run simultaneously in Finnish and English. Gametable may choose to use other language also, but the game material is in Finnish and English.
title: BINGO! 2. Pelautus / 2. Run

description:
"Wasteland Wear & Tear ‚Äì How to create your own post-apocalyptic outfit" is a workshop where you ‚Äì like the name states ‚Äì will craft your own piece of post-apocalyptic clothing. We will provide both assistance and some materials for you to use to make yourself a garment in true post-apo fashion ‚Äì meaning you can make it look as ragged and worn out as you possibly can, plus add some cool details to make it look badass. Materials include fabric scraps, acrylic & fabric paint and different trinkets like bottle caps, chains and such. 

If you already own The Perfect Piece of Clothing that you've been meaning to modify, you can bring it along to finally create That Awesome Post-Apo Something or Other ‚Äì but we will also provide random sized shirts etc. to choose from. As the paint won't dry instantly, when the clothes are done we will hang them up to dry. Be prepared to pick them up later during the con!

Signup through Konsti starting Saturday at 9.00.
title: Wasteland Wear & Tear - How to create your own post-apocalyptic outfit

description:
Come learn the basics of the Japanese halberd, the naginata. Originally developed as a cavalry weapon against foot soldiers, later becoming popular as a woman's home defense weapon. In the battlefield it was the bow, spear and pole-arm weapon`s like the naginata that reigns supreme not the sword that was usually a backup weapon. The naginata allows for superior strong cuts and reach but also demands skill to control. The practice will be done in pairs using soft training weapons. 
We will practice some techniques from Kukishinden ryu as taught in the Bujinkan Dojo. The teacher is Erick Ellison 15 dan.
More information: Bujin.fi

Signup was/is through Konsti - if you can't make it CANCEL YOUR PARTICIPATION so others can attend!
title: How to Use the Naginata [MOVED TO SUNDAY 11:00]

description: In this larp you play a people who inhabit the back of a massive beast cruising through an immense ocean. As it moves, it dips and surfaces to a rhythm that nobody has yet been able to predict, causing the people great anxiety. When the beast dives deeper, the tide rises and the land shrinks; but when it surfaces again, the land is exposed, fertilised and irrigated, encrusted with minerals and vegetation that the people can live on. Over the course of the larp, your relationship to the creature will be tested. Strange things will happen. Things that are frightening and difficult to explain.
title: Leviathan

description:

----

June 15th, 1815. Napoleon has declared himself emperor again and is marching his army into the Netherlands. The French Marshal Ney is tasked with taking the strategically important crossroads of Quatre Bras from the Anglo-Allied commander, the Duke of Wellington.

Come command tens of thousands of troops in this (relatively) simple war strategy game. Will you let the cannons roar or order your cavalry to charge? The keys to victory are in your hand!

description:
An Aldori swordlord who fought alongside Pathfinders years ago is looking for a way to push her students harder. She issues a challenge to Marcos Farabellus, the Master of Swords, boasting that her most promising young pupils can defeat any Marcos has trained. She stakes her pride as a teacher and a powerful weapon she used during the Fifth Crusade on the outcome. Marcos both believes such a relic, taken to the very heart of the Worldwound, would be an excellent addition to the Society's vaults and that the PCs are the perfect students on which to stake his own pride. The PCs must do their utmost to justify the faith he has placed in them and win a great victory - and perhaps a new ally - for the Pathfinder Society.

Written by Tineke Bolleman

Bring your own Pathfinder Society character between levels 1 and 4, or use a pre-made character to jump straight into the action!
title: Pathfinder Quest #14: The Swordlord's Challenge

description:
"The pitch dark of night is only broken by your car's headlights. You've long left behind streetlights, road signs, and other comforts of civilization. The mood in the car is at an all-time low, fear and anger near boiling over. Tonight, nothing is right."

Kult: Divinity Lost is a tabletop horror roleplaying game of a distorted reality, the Illusion, where mankind is imprisoned in a malevolent web of lies. This short scenario is a player-driven & impro-fueled experience about a a group of people, who have ended up in a hostile situation through bad choices and mistakes. The game can be played in Finnish or English.

description:
Chronan - a realm ruled by the theocratic Order, where chaotic forces are suppressed and condemned. Steam technology has brought great prosperity to Chronanese people, and the clergy preaches that it is all thanks to the eight Gods of Time and Order. This harmony is shaken by so-called Agents of Chaos - those that wish to be free to hold other faiths. These Agents seek ancient relics known as Chaos Artifacts that bestow their holders great power. One such artifact is rumored to have arrived to the Clockwork Tower, to the hands of a recluse Master Artificer known as Gnosticus Marvellan.

You are given a mission to retrieve the artifact from Master Marvellan's abode during his absence - either by the Order or the Agents of Chaos. You are aware that the tower is full of traps and guarded by automatons. Shortly after entering, you find yourself overwhelmed by the cunning artificer and drop through a trapdoor into a jail cell. There you find others who share your predicament - and your goal. You have to work together to break from the jail and overcome the security system, but who will get their hands on the prize first?

*This game takes place in the same world as last year's Steampunk game, but requires no experience from the previous game. The game will include five premade 5th level characters to choose from. Pelin voi toteuttaa my√∂s suomeksi, jos kaikki osallistujat niin tahtovat.
shortDescription: Return to Chronan, an original steampunk setting that premiered in Ropecon 2022, for a heist to the Clockwork Tower!
title: Steampunk II

contentWarnings: There might be something about domestic violence - but in an abstract manner.
description:
We play 3-4 short larps written by feminists from different countries and published in #Feminism nano-game anthology.
The games offers bite-sized takes on contemporary feminist issues. The games requires between three and five participants, and up to an hour of play time. We can make several groups, so more participants may play simultainlously.

The games range from silly to serious, including scenarios about cat-calling and menustration blood, as well as reproductive rights and domestic violence. And of course, enjoyment has no ideological boundaries ‚Äì there are games here for participants new to feminism as well as those experienced in making gender arguments on the internet.
otherAccessibilityInformation: There is small written promts, but not very hard to read out loud for me/ other participants.
title: Play away Patriarchy - Feminism Nano-larps

contentWarnings: Death, fear of death, loss, violence, claustorphobia, choking, darkness
description:
Ten days ago the crew and personnel of lunar base Terminus-II gathered to view their first total solar eclipse from the surface of the moon. Minutes after the peak of the eclipse all communication with Earth was lost. The stars went dark. The sun dissapeared. Five days later the International Space Station broadcast a single, static-laden distress call: "They are here".
In the present, the situation on Terminus-II is dire. The solar batteries powering the research station are starting to run empty. Several sections of the base have begun to lose power, the life support systems are dipping into red and the base's degarding A.I. announces more and more of the personnel missing by the moment. As panic takes hold of Terminus-II, only two things are certain: time is running out. And Something moves in the growing dark.

"Umbra" is an intense, collaborative storytelling game that leans heavily on the themes of tragic horror and the opressive, ever-present threat of death. If hope, despair, inevitable failure and characters driven to the brink are something you enjoy, you are most welcomed to join this experience. 
Characters are created at the start of the game. The game includes and deals with heavy themes, to the inclusion of which the players do have some degree of control over. The game is played in a dimly lit/dark space.
shortDescription: The final moments of a futuristic lunar research station and its personnel in the middle of an apocalypse.
title: Umbra (English run)

---

Ropecon will once again host a Digimon Card Game Tournament! Bring along your deck and play with other likeminded people. The tournament is also an excellent opportunity for trading cards with other hobbyists. All cards released prior to the tournament are allowed, with the exception of the those mentioned in the official lists of restricted and banned cards (https://world.digimoncard.com/rule/restriction_card/). The tournament will consist of max. 6 best-of-three rounds, until only one winner remains.

If you forget to bring your own deck or want to participate ex tempore during the convention, no worries! The tournament organizer has a couple of extra decks you can borrow.

You can either bring your own mini or choose from the available selection at the location free of charge (you're free to take the mini home afterwards).

contentWarnings: This workshop is about handling leather. Participants should be comfortable in handling skin-based materials (or seeing other people handle them) - after all, they're taken from something that once lived.
description:
Come make your own piece of leather armour! This workshop is open for anyone regardless of the previous experience with leatherworking, and step-by-step guidance will be provided to all participants who desire so. In addition to getting to make your wet formed piece of armour, a few demonstrations on fundamental leather hardening techniques such as wax-hardening and boiling and tips for the interested will be provided. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned leatherworker or a complete stranger just interested in the medium, this workshop is for you.

Material free for the workshop is 10 ‚Ç¨ for one small leather item such as a demigauntlet or a bracer, or 20 ‚Ç¨ for a pair. You can also participate free of charge and experiment with pieces of scrap leather.

The workshop is held by Juhani "Nahkajuhani" Salonen, a former professional leather armourer and author of the book "Hardened leather and related materials - An armourer's guide" (2023).

Signup through Konsti starting Saturday at 18.00.
otherAccessibilityInformation: The demonstrations may produce some smells, but I would not personally characterize them as strong (such as heated beeswax and/or hide glue). Depending on who'll you ask, the "Strong smells" -box can thus be checked tentatively.
title: Experimental leather armouring workshop

Federal Republic of Western Faer√ªn, 1855 DR. Ten years ago, a gnomish inventor Ivar Erna Karndars founded a furniture store with the aim of offering more affordable living to the Western frontier with mass-produced, ready-to-assemble furniture. Two months ago, Karndars disappeared, leaving behind an empty storefront and a growing legend of missing shoppers, ghosts and magical oddities. The sheriff of the nearby trade town of Hluthvar sends a group of adventurers to investigate...

Pregenerated level 3 characters. Somewhat lighthearted dungeon crawling in a fantasy setting inspired by the western genre.

A famous paladin Auricus and his party are on their way to a monster-infested cave, where a fabled healing crystal lies. You are not the paladin or any of his friends. Instead, you are a monster living in the cave and ready to defend your home by any means. 

In this adventure you get to play various monsters from D&D. Prior knowledge of the system helps but is not mandatory. The game is fairly combat driven but there's also room for role-playing.  

This game can be ran in English, if there's non-Finnish-speaking players present.

description:

Olet j√§senen√§ salaisessa organisaatiossa, joka on sulautunut Yhdysvaltojen hallintoon, ja jonka teht√§v√§n√§ on tutkia paranormaaleja ilmi√∂it√§ ja suojella kansalaisiaan kohdistuvilta ep√§luonnollisilta uhilta. Tunnette sen nimell√§ Delta Green tai yksinkertaisemmin "Ryhm√§".
Agentti Hooker on ilmoittanut teille annetun kertak√§ytt√∂isen puhelimen kautta, ett√§ sinua odottaa l√§heisell√§ lentokent√§ll√§ lentolippu Montanaan, jonka jatkolento l√§htee Chicagosta. Agentti Hooker ja muut ryhm√§n j√§senet odottavat O'Haren lentoasemalla sijaitsevassa Cheers Bar and Grill -ravintolassa 1. lokakuuta teht√§v√§n perehdytyst√§ varten.

Delta Green RPG on moderni kauhuroolipeli jossa pelaajat ovat osana rikollista salaliittoa Yhdysvaltojen salaisen tiedusteluohjelmien sis√§ll√§, jonka teht√§v√§n√§ on puolustaa maatansa ep√§luonnoillisilta uhilta. Peli on yhdistelm√§ X-Filesia, True Detectivea ja H.P. Lovecraftin kosmista kauhua.

S√§√§nt√∂j√§ ei tarvitse osata ennalta, k√§yd√§√§n ne ennen pelin alkua l√§pi yhdess√§. Peliss√§ on tarjolla valmishahmot.

Sis√§lt√∂varoitus: Peli sijoittuu todellisuuteen perustuvaan maailmaan ja k√§sittelee samalla v√§kivaltaa ja mielenterveysongelmia. Lis√§ksi peli sis√§lt√§√§ viittauksia itsemurhaan. Sis√§ll√∂n takia peli tulee olemaan K-18.

--- 
Briefing: The year is 1999. Whatever your day-to-day job is, you have another. You are a member of a secret organization embedded within the United States Government charged with investigating the paranormal and containing unnatural threats to the general public. You know it as Delta Green, or simply "The Group".
Through your issued burner phone, you've been informed by an Agent Hooker that there is a plane ticket to Montana, with a connecting flight out of Chicago, waiting for you at a nearby airport. Agent Hooker, and the rest of your team, will be waiting at the Cheers Bar and Grill at O'Hare on October 1st to brief you on your mission.

Delta Green: The Roleplaying Game is a game set in the modern world where players are members of a criminal conspiracy hidden underneath United States' intelligence system that is tasked to protect their country from unnatural threats. Game is a combination of X-Files, True Detective and the cosmic horror of H.P. Lovecraft.

You don‚Äôt have to know rules beforehand, as we can go through them before the game starts. Pre-generated characters are available.

Content warning: The game is set in a world based on our reality, featuring violence and decaying mental health. It also has references to suicide. Because of the content, the game will be for ages 18 and over.

To Note: Lots of reading handouts. One of the players should be playing as an agent who knows about archeology.

--------------------
 
The conflict between your gangs has finally gone too far and you don't want to suffer more losses than necessary. One member from each side, one gun, one death. After one game of Russian Roulette the gang of the loser would leave the city for good. At least that is what was agreed.

The Last Spin is an intensive 1 hour larp for two players. It focuses on the interaction between the two player characters and the dark atmosphere of the situation. Before the game the players take part in character creation, guided by a set of prewritten questions and some randomness. During the game the decisions of the players and the randomness of a deck of cards representing the gun work together to create a unique narrative for each run.

This run is played in Finnish by default, but the players can agree to play in any language. Instructions are given in either Finnish or English. If you wish to play in English but are signing up without a partner, please join in one of the English runs to guarantee you can participate in your preferred language.

The inspiration for the game comes from a short story of the same name by Evan Hunter.

description:
A larp about passion, family, regrets, fate, hope, and death in a small Ukrainian village nested in the heart of the Carpathian mountains.

Take part in rituals and family drama in a place forgotten by time, where the line between the mundane and the sacred blurs
The game genre is magical realism, where everyday village life coexists with forest spirits, witchcraft, and the Shadows of the dead. Together we play out five seasons of the village's life: Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter, and then Spring again.

Each season begins with the community gathering for traditional ritual. The rest of the season is free play, where players explore their character's relations and conflicts as they change with the passage of time.
otherAuthor: Max Tiseyko, Anastasiia "Bella" Zotova, Anna "FRA" Nazarenko, Hanna Homeniuk, Sas Katherine

description:

Shadowdark RPG on D&D-pohjainen, alkuvuodesta '23 julkaistu helppo, nopea ja virtaviivainen j√§rjestelm√§. --

Welcome to the ancient forests of medieval Finland, where Finnish mythology and folklore come to life alongside horror themes familiar from the Souls video game series. Darkness reigns within the mist-shrouded forests, with dangers lurking around every corner, and beloved characters from the Kalevala, such as V√§in√§m√∂inen and Louhi, have returned to vie for control of the land. Players step into the shoes of undead forest Finns to confront mythical creatures, solve mysteries, and perhaps discover powerful magical artifacts and other legendary treasures.

I will run two games in Ropecon, with the same theme but different content.

Shadowdark RPG is a D&D-based, easy, fast, and streamlined tabletop role-playing system, released in early '23. Participation does not require prior experience in role-playing games, although more experienced players will likely find many mechanics familiar. You have the option to create your own character or play with pre-generated characters.
